```diff
+                             where_conditions.append("(p.is_processing = 1 AND p.is_resolved = 0)")
+                         elif filters['status'] == 'å·²å®Œç»“':
+                             where_conditions.append("p.is_resolved = 1")
+                         else:
                              where_conditions.append("p.status = ?")
                              params.append(filters['status'])
                  posts_data = []
                  for problem in problems:
+                     # è·å–å¤„ç†è®°å½•
+                     cursor.execute('''
+                         SELECT * FROM processing_records 
+                         WHERE problem_id = ? 
+                         ORDER BY created_at ASC
+                     ''', (problem['id'],))
+                     processing_records = cursor.fetchall()
+                     
+                     # æ ¼å¼åŒ–é—®é¢˜æ•°æ®
                      post_data = self._format_problem_data(problem)
                      posts_data.append(post_data)
```

```diff
+     status_counts = {}
+     for problem in problems:

+         status_counts[status] = status_counts.get(status, 0) + 1
+

+     for status, count in status_counts.items():
+         print(f"  {status}: {count} ä¸ª")

+         print(f"  æ ‡é¢˜: {problem['title']}")
+         print(f"  çŠ¶æ€: {problem['status']}")
+         print(f"  å‘å¸ƒæ—¶é—´: {problem['created_at']}")

+         print(f"  æ˜¯å¦å·²å®Œç»“: {problem.get('is_resolved', False)}")
```
